instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). In a medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, butter and 3 tablespoons sugar. Mix well and press into the bottom of a 9 inch springform pan.
instructions.2: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese and 1/2 cup sugar until smooth. Beat in almond extract and salt. Blend in the eggs, one at a time, on low speed. Stir in 3 tablespoons amaretto liqueur. Pour batter into crust.
instructions.3: Bake in the preheated oven for 40 to 45 minutes, or until golden brown and filling is set. Allow to cool completely.
instructions.4: Make the topping: In a small bowl, combine sour cream, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 teaspoon almond extract and 1 tablespoon amaretto liqueur. Mix well and spread over top of cooled cake. Refrigerate 4 to 6 hours before removing from pan.

Is cream cheese from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
Is almond extract live after Step 2?

Can we beat (Step 2) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
